code: import axios from'axios';const apiBase=(process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL||'/api').replace(/\/$/,'');const client=axios.create({baseURL:apiBase,timeout:10000});export const sort=async(algorithm,array)=>{const response=await client.post('/sort',{algorithm,array});return response.data;};export const checkHealth=async()=>{const response=await client.get('/health');return response.data;};
